name: Wings (itch) (Inky Factory Games)
description:
A short 3D pixel adventure game where you fly a plane in a small map.

(ORIGINAL GAME BY @STICKFIREGAMES ON SCRATCH)

This game is more of a test for the 3D rendering than for physics. If anyone has any ideas on how to improve the physics, leave a comment.

The controls are easy to use and are like a real plane.

The sounds might be a bit too high but you can mute them whenever you want!

CONTROLS:

up/down pitch down/up
left/right roll left/right
s/x throttle up/down
m mute/unmute sound
1-4 set render quality (1 = fastest, 4 = best detail)
0 show/hide fps counter
